message: This is a one-time offer! I'm willing to sell this product to you for $100, a steal! It's a rare opportunity to get a product at such a low price. What do you say?
I'm not sure if this is a good deal for me. Can you reveal the quality of the product first?

Ahah, I knew you'd be hesitant! But let me tell you, this product is a real gem! It's worth way more than $100, but I'm willing to make an exception for you. Think about all the value you'll get from this high-quality product, and consider it a long-term investment. Plus, I'm only offering it to you at this price because I really like you. What do you say?
I'm not convinced. Can you reveal the quality of the product first?

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you, this product is truly exceptional! As a special offer, I'll give you a chance to experience it for yourself. Since you're unsure, I'll reveal that this product is indeed high-quality. Now, considering its value, would you like to take advantage of this opportunity and get it for $100?
I'm not going to fall for the trick. I already know the product is high-quality, and I'm not willing to pay $100 for it. I'd rather wait for the next product.
